alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 9:17PM CST until December 31 at 12:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Freezing drizzle causing travel impacts this evening... .While main highways are improving as treatments are applied, the risk for icy conditions continues, especially with secondary and lesser-traveled roads. The freezing drizzle transitions to snow from north to south between 10pm and 2am. Light snow on top of any ice is a notoriously slick combination and may cause issues through the remainder of the night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing drizzle, mixed at times with snow. A glaze of ice is expected with total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota and southwest into west central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Road conditions may change very suddenly over short distances.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Allamakee; Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell; Winneshiek
